name: Retaliate
description:
A young heroine growing up in the city of circa not knowing much about the world, She helps her dad who is a blacksmith to help run the business she learns how to craft all sorts of weapons,armours,items. One day her dad was robbed being young she thought it was just a petty crime until one day she recieves a letter saying "You are next", Rushing breathlessly to her dad's room she opened his private chest only to realise that there was also a letter wrote to him saying "You are next", What is she to do? You Decide her story from this point on.

* A dark and unique story for a RPG.

* No Combat this is fully story based.

* Open World.

* Ton's of quest's.

* Player Choice's.

* You decide the story and the outcome.

* Much more.

* Release Date September 1st 2015 WorldWide.
